text.config.soaring_phantoms.option.doAl:
Enable altitude-based spawning.
Game will attempt to spawn phantoms when player is above defined start height.
Spawn chance increases the higher the player is.
Disables vanilla insomnia-based spawning.
text.config.soaring_phantoms.option.spaw:
Set Y height from which the game will attempt to spawn phantoms.
The chance of a spawn attempt succeeding is 1 - (startHeight / currentPlayerHeight).
Amount of time in seconds between each phantom spawn attempt.

Maximum amount of seconds to be added to the base spawn frequency,
ranging from 0 to the defined bound.
text.config.soaring_phantoms.option.phan: Repel Phantoms with Defined Held Items

Phantoms will be unable to spawn if the player is holding
any repellent item in their hand or offhand.
Define repellent items in the list below.
